attributes.action: End the so called sport of Staghunting as was achieved with hare coursing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have 3 staghound packs that no longer hunt traditionally due to the 2004 Act, they have now, no interest in managing deer. 
It is commonplace for several deer to be killed in one day - our best stags never make the rut. If we do nothing, herds of more than 10 deer will be a rare sight on Exmoor within 5 years. 
I am not an anti hunting person - just anti stag hunting. These beautiful shy animals do not deserve to be hunted to exhaustion.
